channel.title: Sony Icf 2010 on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Sony Icf 2010 on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Two repaired shortwave receivers in one day !
item.description: From the fix-it-yourself department, two successful radio repairs in one day. For my dad Lewis Peters’s old Kenwood R-2000, a replaced 100ma 5x20mm fuse brought it back to life. The antenna fuse search took a rather long time to get started, but the help of the UMARC club and Dean KD8VXR was enough to unearth the right part. For reference the Mouser part number is 693-0034.3107 for a Schurter fuse.
